Ext.layout.container.Auto Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.layout.container.Auto auto autocontainer layout container
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.Panel', {
        width: 500,
        height: 280,
        title: "AutoLayout Panel",
        layout: 'auto',
        renderTo: document.body,
        items: [{
            xtype: 'panel',
            title: 'Top Inner Panel',
            width: '75%',
            height: 90
        }, {
            xtype: 'panel',
            title: 'Bottom Inner Panel',
            width: '75%',
            height: 90
        }]
    });
});
